category: news
title: "Fintech firm Perfios announces Esop buyback worth ₹154 crore"
excerpt: "New Delhi: SaaS fintech company Perfios has announced it will buy back shares worth ₹ 154 crore from 135 employees. The Bengaluru-based company, which also has an account aggregator licence, said the Esop (employee stock ownership plan) buyback has created 62 millionaires."
